bug.author: Jie-Yuan
bug.summary: TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for /: 'Dimension' and 'float'
bug.description: TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for /: 'Dimension' and 'float'

comments.comment: Hi ï¼ŒThis bug is caused by tensorflow version higher than 1.6.0. You can download the latest version through pip install -U deepctr,the bug is fixed and now deepctr supports tensorflow version from 1.4.0-1.12.0 except for 1.7.* and 1.8.*
